title: Jeff Cook, a Founder of the Country Band Alabama, Dies at 73
description: His group had 32 No. 1 country singles, and his guitar and fiddle playing helped extend its reach to a generation raised on rock ’n’ roll.
dc:creator: Bill Friskics-Warren
category: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
media:description: Jeff Cook of Alabama in concert at Madison Square Garden in 1988. He brought a Southern-rock bravado to the group’s often middle-of-the-road approach.
